video.title: Building a Solid State Laser - Pt. 1
video.description:
PART 2: https://youtu.be/vC3VKAqnwIE

Showcasing the operation principles and engineering decisions needed to build an Nd:Glass laser in the homeshop.This project is a work in progress,  and still needs some work to get it operational.

============================Links============================

Awesome website with some info about Solid State Lasers: http://www.repairfaq.org/sam/lasercps.htm#cpstoc

The Bible:
http://www-personal.umich.edu/~andrewcb/DSO/Books/Solid-State%20Lasers%20-%20A%20Graduate%20Text%20-%20%20W.Koechner,%20M.Bass.pdf

Info about flashtubes:
https://www.flashlamps-vq.com/CatalogueVQF.pdf

Applied Science's Ruby Laser:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VSdUQ4oNKiI
